trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Reconoce los gestos de entrada de lápiz.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifica un gesto de lápiz.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Puede establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconocer todos o un subconjunto de los movimientos de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> para que reconozca un subconjunto de los movimientos disponibles, pase una <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> matriz en el constructor o utilice el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contiene un movimiento, llamada la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: No se puede utilizar esta clase en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo determinar si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> es un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea con este constructor, la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconoce todos los movimientos de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> que especifica los gestos de la aplicación que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconocerá.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> constructor para crear un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> que reconoce un subconjunto de los movimientos de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> que reconoce solo la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, y <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> movimientos.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, después de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los gestos que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconoce.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that contains gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> que contiene los gestos que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconoce.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the application gestures that a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo obtener la aplicación gestos que un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconoce.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor booleano que indica si el reconocedor de gestos está disponible en el sistema del usuario.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" />si está disponible el componente de reconocimiento; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether the gesture recognizer is available before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo determinar si el reconocedor de movimientos está disponible antes de llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> en la que se van a buscar gestos.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Busca gestos en la colección <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> that contains application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognized.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> que contiene los gestos de la aplicación que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconoció.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: La matriz devuelta por la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> método se ordena por el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values:
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> puede devolver un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> matriz con los valores siguientes:

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: Índice

trans-unit.source: ApplicationGesture
trans-unit.target: ApplicationGesture

trans-unit.source: RecognitionConfidence
trans-unit.target: RecognitionConfidence

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Esto significa que la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconoce que es muy probable que la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> es una marca de verificación, relativamente probable que el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> no un gesto y probablemente no generarlos en absoluto que el <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> es un curlicue o un curlicue doble.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> método puede devolver una matriz con <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> con una <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> que otros movimientos de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Esto significa que es más probable que la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> no es un movimiento, en lugar de un gesto que tenga un menor <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo determinar si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> es un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestos.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> que especifica los gestos de la aplicación que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> debe reconocer.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Establece los gestos de la aplicación que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconoce.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> que reconoce solo la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, y <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> movimientos.
